---
applyTo: "pulumi/environments/**"
---
## What are these files for?
These files are used to instantiate Pulumi stacks for different environments. Each file corresponds to a specific environment (e.g., development, staging, production) and contains the necessary configuration and settings to deploy infrastructure using Pulumi.

## WHen modifying these files
When adding or modifying Pulumi the pulumi instantiation files in this directory, please follow the guidelines in this AGENT.md file: <repo root>/pulumi/environments/AGENT.md
